info.title: Massa OpenRPC Specification
info.description: Massa OpenRPC Specification document. Find more information on https://docs.massa.net/en/latest/technical-doc/api.html

methods.name: execute_read_only_bytecode
methods.summary: Execute a smart contract in a read only context
methods.description: Execute a smart contract in a read only context. The changes on the ledger will not be applied and directly drop after the context of the execution. All the events generated will be returned.

methods.name: execute_read_only_call
methods.summary: Call a function of a contract in a read only context
methods.description: Call a function of a contract in a read only context. The changes on the ledger will not be applied and directly drop after the context of the execution. All the events generated will be returned.

params.name: address
params.description: Need to provide at least one valid address

methods.name: get_addresses
methods.summary: To check when your address is selected to stake.
methods.description:
To check when your address is selected to stake, run this command and look at the “next draws” section.
Also check that your balance increases, for each block or endorsement that you create you should get a small reward.

params.name: blockId
params.description: Need to provide at least one valid block id

params.name: slot
params.description: Slot of the block

methods.name: get_blockclique_block_by_slot
methods.summary: Get a block in the blockclique
methods.description: Get the block in the blockclique that is associated to the slot

params.name: DatastoreEntryInput(s)
params.description: Datastore entry input

methods.name: get_datastore_entries
methods.summary: Get a data entry both at the latest final and active executed slots for the given addresses.
methods.description:
Get a data entry both at the latest final and active executed slots for the given addresses.

If an existing final entry (final_value) is found in the active history, it will return its final value in active_value field. If it was deleted in the active history, it will return null in active_value field.

params.name: endorsementId
params.description: Need to provide at least one valid endorsement id

methods.name: get_filtered_sc_output_event
methods.description: Returns events optionally filtered by: start slot, end slot, emitter address, original caller address, operation id.

params.name: operationId
params.description: Need to provide at least one valid operation id

methods.name: get_stakers
methods.description: Returns the active stakers and their roll counts for the current cycle.

methods.name: get_status
methods.description: Summary of the current state: time, last final blocks (hash, thread, slot, timestamp), clique count, connected nodes count.

params.name: SecretKeys
params.description: The strings must be secret(private) keys

thread.description: The thread the address belongs to

is_stale.description: true if incompatible with a final block

is_in_blockclique.description: true if in the greatest clique

param.description: Parameter to pass to the function

block_ids.description: The block ids of the blocks in that clique

fitness.description: Depends on descendants and endorsement count

is_blockclique.description: True if it is the clique of higher fitness

end_timestamp.description:
(Only in tesnets)
Time in milliseconds when the blockclique started.

genesis_timestamp.description: Time in milliseconds when the blockclique started.

max_block_size.description: Maximum size (in bytes) of a block

pos_lock_cycles.description: PoS look back cycles: when drawing for cycle N, we use the rolls from cycle N - `pos_look` `back_cycles` - 1

pos_lookback_cycles.description: PoS lock cycles: when some rolls are released, we only credit the coins back to their owner after waiting `pos_lock_cycles`

t0.description: Time between the periods in the same thread.

gas_cost.description: The gas cost for the execution

max_gas.description: Maximum amount of gas that the execution of the contract is allowed to cost.

start.description:
Optional start slot
Will use by default Slot(0,0)

end.description:
Optional end slot
Will use by default Slot(0,0)

is_final.description: Optional filter to filter only candidate or final events

is_error.description: Optional filter to retrieve events generated in a failed execution

EventExecutionContext.title: EventExecutionContext
EventExecutionContext.description: Context of the event (not generated by the user)

read_only.description: Wether the event was generated during  read only call

call_stack.description: Addresses, most recent at the end

index_in_slot.description: Index of the event in the slot

is_error.description: Whether the event was generated in a failed executed or not

is_stale.description: true if incompatible with a final block

is_in_blockclique.description: true if in the greatest clique

parents.description: As many block Ids as there are threads

connected_nodes.description: Connected nodes (node id, ip address, true if the connection is outgoing, false if incoming)

current_cycle_time.description: current cycle starting time in milliseconds since 1970-01-01

next_cycle_time.description: next cycle starting time in milliseconds since 1970-01-01

last_slot.description: Latest slot, none if now is before genesis timestamp

fee.description: the fee they have decided for this operation

expire_period.description: after `expire_period` slot the operation won't be included in a block

in_blocks.description:
Block ids
The operation appears in `in_blocks`
If it appears in multiple blocks, these blocks are in different cliques

in_pool.description: True if operation is still in pool

is_final.description: True if the operation is final (for example in a final block)

thread.description: Thread in which the operation can be included

serialized_content.description: The serialized version of the content `base58` encoded

Transaction.description: transfer coins from sender to recipient

CallSC.description: Calls an exported function from a stored smart contract

RollBuy.description: the sender buys `roll_count` rolls. Roll price is defined in configuration

RollSell.description: the sender sells `roll_count` rolls. Roll price is defined in configuration

PageRequest.title: PageRequest
PageRequest.description: An PageRequest object, which contains limit (max elements par page) and a page offset.

PrivateKey.description: `PrivateKey` is used for signature and decryption

PublicKey.description:
Public key used to check if a message was encoded by the corresponding `PublicKey`.
Generated from the `KeyPair` using `SignatureEngine`

PubkeySig.description: Public key and a signature it has produced used for serialization/deserialization purpose

is_final.description: Whether to start execution from final or active state

ReadOnlyResult.title: ReadOnlyResult
ReadOnlyResult.description: The result of a read-only execution

Ok.description: Included in case of success. The result of the execution

Error.description: Included in case of error. The error message

RollBuy.description: the sender buys `roll_count` rolls. Roll price is defined in configuration

RollSell.description: the sender sells `roll_count` rolls. Roll price is defined in configuration

read_only.description: Wether the event was generated during  read only call

data.description: String of the event you sended

context.description: Context generated by the execution context

Signature.description: Signature generated from a message and a `KeyPair`.

PageRequest.name: PageRequest
PageRequest.description: An Page request parameter, which contains limit and offset properties.

Staker.name: Staker
Staker.description: A Staker object. A tuple which contains (address, active_rolls)
